mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO recovery_stat ( client_id, month, start_transaction_date, total_amount, recovered_amount, recovered_rate, avg_recovered_days ) VALUES
( #{item.clientId}, #{item.month}, #{item.startTransactionDate}, #{item.totalAmount}, #{item.recoveredAmount}, #{item.recoveredRate}, #{item.avgRecoveredDays} )
mapper.select: SELECT rs.stat_id , rs.client_id , DATE(rs.start_transaction_date) AS start_transaction_date, c.name, rs.`month` , rs.total_amount , rs.recovered_amount , rs.recovered_rate , rs.avg_recovered_days , rs.created_at FROM recovery_stat rs INNER JOIN client c ON c.client_id = rs.client_id WHERE DATE(rs.created_at) = #{entity.createdAt}
